tools.name: edhrec_average_deck
tools.description: Fetch EDHREC Average Deck for a commander. Supports all brackets (all, exhibition/Bracket 1, core/Bracket 2, upgraded/Bracket 3, optimized/Bracket 4, cedh/Bracket 5) and budget variants (/budget or /expensive for each bracket).

bracket.description: Bracket level with optional budget variant. Can use bracket names (all, exhibition, core, upgraded, optimized, cedh), numbers (1-5 for Brackets 1-5), or include /budget or /expensive suffix.

tools.name: edhrec_budget_comparison
tools.description: Fetch both budget and expensive average deck variants for a commander. Returns All (Budget) and All (Expensive) decks from EDHREC for cost comparison.
